verbs.description: [ARG0: China] [ARGM-TMP: last week] [V: retaliated] [ARG1: against President Trump] [ARG2: with tariffs of the same scale and the same strength as those that he had announced] .
China last week retaliated against President Trump with tariffs of the same scale and the same strength as those that he [V: had] announced .
China last week retaliated against President Trump with tariffs of the same scale and the same strength as [ARG1: those] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: he] had [V: announced] .
